about_the_game:
Plot Summary:

Gerald won the Kendo Championship and was appointed by the king to form a new knight regiment in the army. He and his childhood friend Delia, filled with dreams, came to the barracks, only to be caught in a conspiracy. During the process of resolving the crisis, their feelings for each other deepened, and they met the empathetic knight Claire and the lovely Nico. More stories await your exploration.

Character Introduction:

Delia：

She appears cold on the outside, but in fact, she is a devoted and gentle girl.

Claire：

A lovely female knight with a strong sense of justice.

Nico：

A seemingly weak priestess with a resilient heart.

Game Features:

  • Embark on an adventure with the protagonist and find love along the way.
  • Easy-to-learn, strategy-rich turn-based combat.
  • Distinctive classes and unique skills, with each class possessing powerful ultimate abilities.
  • Avoid monsters through positioning and enjoy relatively free battle choices.

Publisher Miss Banana has now been renamed Hera Games. Thank you for your support!

content_descriptors.notes:
- This game contains some sexually suggestive and kissing depictions.
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

short_description: Gerald aspires to be a hero-like adventurer. As he and his childhood friend Delia work towards realizing their dreams, they uncover a shocking conspiracy. What kind of trials will they face?
